Water Tracker: Your Personal Hydration Assistant
Stay hydrated and healthy with Water Tracker, the easy-to-use Chrome extension that helps you monitor your daily water intake!
ðŸ’§ Key Features:

Simple Tracking: Easily log your water intake with just a few clicks.
Customizable Goals: Set and adjust your daily hydration targets.
Visual Progress: Watch your circular progress bar fill as you reach your daily goal.
Smart Reminders: Set custom reminders to keep you drinking water throughout the day.
Detailed History: View your hydration history to track your long-term habits.
Automatic Reset: Your daily intake resets at midnight, ready for a new day.
